input.sentences: it is fall and the leaves are changing colors .
a small stream runs through the park .
there is a wooden bridge going from the parking lot to the park .
there is also a gravel trail going in to the woods .
there is a house on the outskirts that belongs to the person who owns the park .
output.sentences: The colors of the fall leaves in the park were beautiful.
The park has a stream that runs through the property.
Walking over the wooden bridge from the parking lot to the park was a good start.
We hiked on the gravel trail through the woods.
The person who owns the park really taught us a lot about nature hiking.
